thread.title: "Goldilocks" jobs report fueling Wall Street, says Kristina Hooper

title: "Goldilocks" jobs report fueling Wall Street, says Kristina Hooper
text:
"Goldilocks" jobs report fueling Wall Street, says Kristina Hooper 7:54pm BST - 04:32
Invesco's global chief market strategist also tells Reuters' Fred Katayama investors should allocate more of their equity portfolios to Europe and the emerging markets. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
